about_the_game:
Congrats! As a model employee of Cattlehorse Corp, you've been assigned to an abandoned underground warehouse to recover junk… I mean, valuable assets! But here's the problem—rival companies have planted undercover agents who are double-dipping, slacking off, and trying to sabotage your efforts. Stay alert! Luckily, the company has equipped you with some absurd high-tech gadgets and makeshift tools. They’re not free, but you get them at an employee discount. Use your corporate wisdom to outsmart the troublemakers and complete your mission. And there’s a mysterious middle manager on your team—better stay on their good side, since they’ve got a gun.

Core Game Features

  • Random Map Generation: Each round, the game generates a random underground facility with all devices placed differently. Players can leave marks to help themselves or their teammates navigate.

  • Vast Variety of Items: Players have access to a wide range of fun tools, such as tasers, metal detectors, and energy drinks. They can also eat and drink to restore health.

  • Bank System: Players earn points during each run and can choose to save their earnings or spend them all at once. A bonus is awarded if their side wins.

  • Vending Machine: Players can purchase items from a vending machine, ranging from inexpensive food and drinks to valuable tools like a tase mine or a teleport beacon.

  • Proximity Chat: Built-in text and voice chat that can only be heard or seen by players within range. Players can use a power box to broadcast messages across the entire map.

  • Community: Join the community to share feedback on game features or suggest new items. The developer will continue adding fresh content to enhance the experience.

Essential Game Mechanics

(Early access, rules may change)

  • There are 3 roles: Good guy, Bad guy and Judge, each with different goals.

  • You can deposit points earned during the mission in the bank, or withdraw them for latter use, if you fail to make it back alive, you loose all your inventory points, points can be used to buy items before or during the mission.

  • Retrieve items from locked containers, play a mini-game to open them up.

  • Feed someone by using a food item while aiming at them.

  • You can choose to reveal your identity or your weapon if you want, but keeping it to yourself might be MORE advantageous.

  • If you get low on hunger or thirst, your max stamina will decrease, you may also starve to death.

  • Rooms and interactables will be RANDOMIZED during each mission.

  • If someone dies, EVERYTHING in their inventory drops.

  • You can find points in locked containers, it is used for purchasing goods on a Vending Machine.

  • You will have SECRET objectives, keep them to yourself and complete them to get rewards.

  • You can cast votes at a Voting Terminal for someone you think is a Bad Guy.

  • Players put down by force splatters toxic liquid out of their suites all over the place, NEARBY players might be damaged.

As a Good Guy

  • Try to retrieve all company properties and repair all damaged devices, you can choose to leave at the evacuation zone after everything is finished.

  • Vote for suspicious employee in your crew or report to the Judge.

  • You have a better chance to get more rewards when completing secrete objectives.

  • Stay alive.

As a Bad Guy

  • The goal is to put down all good guys before evacuation.

  • Be aware that your role weapon contains metal and can be detected by a Metal Detector.

  • SABOTAGE locks, power boxes and containers with your role weapon when you have chance, it'll prevent good guys from evacuating too soon.

  • If all good guys are dead, bad guys win.

As a Judge

  • The goal is to find and ELIMINATE all Bad Guys, could be more than one.

  • You may choose to reveal yourself, or hide and pretend to be a Good Guy to LURE out the Bads.

  • You have high damage resistance which makes you harder to kill but you are NOT invincible.

  • You can see others' vote counts directly when pointing at them.

Good luck, may you return alive, get promoted, and reach the peak of your career!

short_description: Welcome to Cattlehorse Corp, where deadlines are tight, and backstabbing is tighter! Complete tasks, expose traitors, and suck up to management—just make sure you survive. Use wacky gadgets, bluff, and betray to climb the corporate ladder. In this office, only survivors get promotions!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French
